name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bill Wurtz Question Date to Link

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click on a date on the questions page to open in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension eliminates the need to manually write out a formatted link to a specific question on the questions page at billwurtz.com. Just select the date, right click, and click "Open question in new tab" to open the question in a new tab.
